title: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException
body:
### Description

was just letting the monkey runner running on my app and got this leakcanary crash;

```
02-29 02:19:14.858  3103  3103 E AndroidRuntime: Process: org.ligi.passandroid, PID: 3103
02-29 02:19:14.858  3103  3103 E AndroidRuntime: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: length=5; index=-1
02-29 02:19:14.858  3103  3103 E AndroidRuntime: 	at java.util.ArrayList.remove(ArrayList.java:506)
02-29 02:19:14.858  3103  3103 E AndroidRuntime: 	at leakcanary.internal.navigation.NavigatingActivity.goBack(NavigatingActivity.kt:128)
02-29 02:19:14.858  3103  3103 E AndroidRuntime: 	at leakcanary.internal.navigation.ViewsKt.goBack(Views.kt:30)
02-29 02:19:14.858  3103  3103 E AndroidRuntime: 	at leakcanary.internal.activity.screen.HeapDumpScreen$onSuccessRetrieved$1$1$1$1.invoke(HeapDumpScreen.kt:68)
02-29 02:19:14.858  3103  3103 E AndroidRuntime: 	at leakcanary.internal.activity.screen.HeapDumpScreen$onSuccessRetrieved$1$1$1$1.invoke(HeapDumpScreen.kt:30)
02-29 02:19:14.858  3103  3103 E AndroidRuntime: 	at leakcanary.internal.activity.db.Db$execute$1$1.invoke(Db.kt:36)
02-29 02:19:14.858  3103  3103 E AndroidRuntime: 	at leakcanary.internal.activity.db.Db$execute$1$1.invoke(Db.kt:9)
02-29 02:19:14.858  3103  3103 E AndroidRuntime: 	at leakcanary.internal.activity.db.Io$execute$2$1.invoke(Io.kt:55)
02-29 02:19:14.858  3103  3103 E AndroidRuntime: 	at leakcanary.internal.activity.db.Io$execute$2$1.run(Io.kt:10)
02-29 02:19:14.858  3103  3103 E AndroidRuntime: 	at android.os.Handler.handleCallback(Handler.java:789)
02-29 02:19:14.858  3103  3103 E AndroidRuntime: 	at android.os.Handler.dispatchMessage(Handler.java:98)
02-29 02:19:14.858  3103  3103 E AndroidRuntime: 	at android.os.Looper.loop(Looper.java:164)
02-29 02:19:14.858  3103  3103 E AndroidRuntime: 	at android.app.ActivityThread.main(ActivityThread.java:6541)
02-29 02:19:14.858  3103  3103 E AndroidRuntime: 	at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Native Method)
02-29 02:19:14.858  3103  3103 E AndroidRuntime: 	at com.android.internal.os.Zygote$MethodAndArgsCaller.run(Zygote.java:240)
02-29 02:19:14.858  3103  3103 E AndroidRuntime: 	at com.android.internal.os.ZygoteInit.main(ZygoteInit.java:767)

```

### Version Information

* LeakCanary version: 2.2
* Android OS version: 26
